name: Procurement Quality Control / Expediting Specialist
description:
Your responsibilities will include but not limited to:

  • Verify and follow up the production schedule issued by the suppliers;
  • Analysis of quality requirements set out by the Customer for the Project;
  • Technical audits of potential vendors in line with Project requirements;
  • Assesses the availability and completeness of qualification certificates for welders and welding specialists in accordance with the requirements of Russian (NAKS) and international standards (ASME, AWS, ISO);

  • Determines the validity of the application of welding (surfacing) technologies for certain types of equipment;

  • Review of all quality control documentation provided by the Customer, vendors, subvendors for the Project;

  • Track orders from placement through delivery;
  • Progress reports preparation and following the criticalities.

Successful candidate profile:

  • Higher education (technical);
  • Relevant experience no less than 5 years;
  • Successful participation in multinational EPC projects;
  • Good knowledge of fabrication process for Rotating, Static Equipment, Electrical and Instrumentation, Piping and Steel Structures;
  • Knowledge of International and Russian standards for different types of equipment (ASME, API, GOST, etc.);
  • Strong understanding of quality control standards and testing techniques;
  • Capability to read and understand mechanical general arrangement drawings, layouts, P&ID, Wiring Diagram, etc.;

  • Welding engineer certificate (IWE / IWI) as a plus;

  • Ability to work carefully with information and large amount of data;
  • English –intermediate level (both oral & written).

We offer:

  • Opportunity to get involved in truly exciting projects;
  • Great place to work with an excellent chance for continuous professional development;
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
